description: This file initializes and renders the root React component into the DOM, serving as the entry point for a React application.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A wrapper component that helps with highlighting potential problems in an application.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component hierarchy into the React root.
